trends: There has been one other sighting in Sandy Ridge
There was one other sighting in Sandy Ridge on or around January 31st 2002
divs: Sighting Details Driving truck 3:45 am.The sky got very bright.noquestion a ufo.Amazed and excited that I seen it.Went from high to very low infront of me I can describe every detail.was going fast and straight just wentout of sight like it was going to the ground.Ive been driveing at night for 23yrs.looking in the sky this is the first year I saw anything.A month before thatI saw two flying sausers 100 yards from my house coming home from work at 5:55pm.I saw the show sightings this morning on sci-fi that inspired me to contactyou.Thanks for listning.Bruce
